title: Feisty butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['2 butternut squash, peeled and cubed', '2 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 medium onion, chopped', 'corn oil for frying', '2 cloves of garlic, chopped', '1 red chilli (including seeds), sliced', '100ml extra thick double cream', '160g Cheshire cheese, grated', 'salt and pepper to taste']
